Package org.taverna.server.master.identity

Implementations of beans that map global user identities to local usernames.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserStoreAPI
    The API that is exposed by the DAO that exposes user management.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorityDerivedIDMapper
    Extracts the local user id from the set of Spring Security authorities granted to the current user.
    CompositeIDMapper
    An identity mapper that composes the results from other mappers, using the identity mappers in order until one can provide a non-null answer.
    ConstantIDMapper
    A trivial principal to user mapper that always uses the same ID.
    NameIDMapper
    A trivial identity mapper that just uses the name out of the Principal, or uses a regular expression to extract it from the string representation of the principal.
    StrippedDownAuthProvider
    A stripped down version of a DaoAuthenticationProvider/ AbstractUserDetailsAuthenticationProvider that avoids much of the overhead associated with that class.
    User
    The representation of a user in the database.
    UserStore
    The bean class that is responsible for managing the users in the database.
    UserStore.CachedUserStore  
    WorkflowInternalAuthProvider
    A special authentication provider that allows a workflow to authenticate to itself.
    WorkflowInternalAuthProvider.WorkflowSelfAuthority  
    WorkflowInternalAuthProvider.WorkflowSelfIDMapper  

Package org.taverna.server.master.identity Description

Implementations of beans that map global user identities to local usernames.
